title: Polymer Electrolytes with High Cation Transport Number for Rechargeable Li−Metal Batteries: Current Status and Future Direction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03097D, Review Article
Xinyuan Shan, Zhaowei Song, Hang Ding, Lengwan Li, Yuhang Tian, Alexei P Sokolov, Ming Tian, kang Xu, Pengfei Cao
The development of solid polymer electrolytes for lithium−metal (Li0) batteries (LMBs) with high energy density and high safety has been a long-standing goal that attracted intensive efforts for over four...
